import React, { useState } from 'react' import Card from '../../UI/Card' import styles from './UserForm.module.css' const UserForm = (props) => { const [enteredName, setEnteredName] = useState('') const [enteredAge, setEnteredAge] = useState('') const nameChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredName(event.target.value) } const ageChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredAge(event.target.value) } console.log(enteredName, enteredAge) return (
) } export default UserForm
